item.description: Home BCTS description BCTS (short for blockchain technology and system) is a research group aiming to promote the scalability of the blockchain systems and explore the potential application scenario of the blockchain technology. Also, BCTS group tries to dig out values by analyzing the blockchain data, and enable cross-chain value transfer and data sharing. BCTS group is under Cluster and Grid Computing Lab of Huazhong University of Science and Technology.
